fortune-energy-analysis-report.name: Fortune Energy Analysis Report
fortune-energy-analysis-report.description:
Unlock ancient Eastern wisdom and explore your numerology energy code

**Service Includes:**

**1. Numerology Structure Analysis**
Based on your birth date and time (Four Pillars), our cultural lineage holders will provide an in-depth interpretation of your innate talents, personality traits, and life trajectory using Five Elements theory (Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, Earth):
- How the Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches combinations influence your personality and relationships
- How special auspicious stars (such as Tianyi Noble, Taiji Noble) enhance your fortune
- The deep connections between the Twelve Palaces and your life experiences

**2. Annual Fortune Analysis (2026-2027)**
Detailed interpretation of energy flow and fortune changes for the coming year:
- How the Five Elements cycles affect your career development, relationships, and decision timing
- Practical advice combined with modern life scenariosâ€”how to seize opportunities and avoid risks
- Exclusive guidance for key areas including wealth, health, and interpersonal relationships

The two reports complement each other, creating a complete numerology map spanning past, present, and future!

**After Purchase:**
1. After payment, please send your detailed birth information (date, exact time, birthplace) to: seondo@cneraart.com
   Example: December 12, 1978, 12:20 PM, New York, USA
2. Our cultural lineage holders will use ancient Chinese Five Elements philosophy to analyze your unique energy patterns
3. You will receive your exclusive Numerology Energy Analysis Report via email within 3-5 business days

**Privacy & Personalization Guarantee:**
We highly value your privacyâ€”all information is strictly confidential. This is not fortune-telling, but understanding your energy patterns to help you live more clearly and confidently.

**Why Choose Us?**
- For just $19, get an in-depth personalized report blending ancient wisdom with modern practice
- Perfect for those seeking career advancement, relationship harmony, emotional balance, health optimization, or personal growth guidance
- A unique insight experienceâ€”like a personality assessment refined over millennia!

**Note:** This service strictly follows traditional cultural interpretation and provides directional guidance only. All results are for reference only.

destiny-analysis-wutai-mountain-blessing.name: Destiny Analysis + Wutai Mountain Cultural Ceremony
destiny-analysis-wutai-mountain-blessing.description:
Dear friend, do you wish to understand your life trajectory while infusing your future with positive cultural energy? For just $79, you'll receive a complete Numerology Energy Analysis Report, plus our team will conduct an exclusive cultural wish ceremony at China's cultural heritage siteâ€”Mount Wutai! Lighting the path forward for you and your loved ones.

**Your Exclusive Package Includes:**

**Numerology Analysis Report (Delivered within 3-5 days)**
- Personalized interpretation of your numerology structure and energy interactions based on your birth data
- In-depth analysis of your major life cycles, helping you seize key opportunities in 2026-2027
- Covering career, wealth, relationships, health, and other dimensions
- Blending traditional Five Elements philosophy with modern life applications for practical advice

**Wutai Mountain Cultural Wish Ceremony (Video delivered within 10-15 days)**
- Choose **Lamp Lighting** (illuminating the path of wisdom) or **Incense Offering** (wishing for peace, removing obstacles)
- Our team will visit the Mount Wutai cultural heritage site and record the entire ceremony
- The video will include your name recitation, wish cultural intentions, and the ceremony processâ€”ensuring transparency and sincerity
- Every lamp and every incense stick is lit exclusively for you

**How to Participate?**
1. Click the purchase link and select the $79 package
2. After payment, send your name, birth information, and ceremony preference (lamp or incense) to: seondo@cneraart.com
   Example: December 12, 1978, 12:20 PM, New York, USA
3. You'll receive the Numerology Energy Analysis Report via email within 3-5 business days
4. The ceremony video will be sent to your email within 10-15 days after the ceremony

**Why Choose This Upgraded Version?**
- Not just predictionâ€”infuse your life with positive cultural energy
- Ancient wisdom + cultural ceremony, dual protection
- Full video recordingâ€”sincere, credible, and transparent
- Suitable for various wishes: career success, family harmony, fortune improvement, academic progress, etc.

One report, one lamp, one wish, one transformation.

May we together open the door of destiny and welcome a bright future.

**Note:** This service is a traditional cultural experience. We respect all cultural beliefsâ€”sincerity matters most. This service strictly follows traditional cultural interpretation and provides directional guidance only. All results are for reference only.

checkout.direct_payment_title: Why Direct Payment? â€” The Sacred Channel
checkout.direct_payment_desc: Each dharma object has been personally consecrated through the ancient Qi-Yun ceremony at Wutai Mountain. To preserve the unbroken flow of spiritual energy from temple to recipient, we transmit all offerings through direct channels â€” free from third-party intermediaries that may disrupt the sacred bond between the item and its destined keeper.
checkout.direct_discount_text: Save 10% â€” Direct blessing, direct savings. No intermediary fees means we pass the full merit back to you.
checkout.sacred_vow_desc: As the Dharma teaches: A sincere offering always finds its way. We solemnly vow that every consecrated item will be dispatched with care and delivered to its rightful keeper. Should any obstacle arise, we resolve it with full transparency â€” for the merit of this exchange belongs to both giver and receiver. Your trust is our sacred responsibility.

aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
aboutUs.paragraph1: Cultural lineage holders of Mount Wutai personally unlock millennia of ancient Eastern wisdom, grounded in the I Ching, birth charts, Zi Wei Dou Shu, Plum Blossom I Ching, Golden Key Verses, and the Great Six Yao. Integrating the Five Elements' cycles of generation and restraint with Western astrology, we deeply analyze career, wealth, health, and interpersonal fortunesâ€”revealing opportunities, warning of obstaclesâ€”to help you navigate life's currents and broaden your horizons.
aboutUs.paragraph2: We follow traditional ceremonies such as the Imbuing Ceremony and ancient chanting, solemn and proper, infusing each guardian token with pure aspiration, harmonizing body and mind energy, and calming the spirit. With millennia of wisdom, we answer modern life's perplexities, using exclusive protection to ensure a smooth life and flourishing fortune.
